data.title: Book TELL ME LIES for your event! — Book Great Bands │ brioLIVE │ Charlotte Columbia Charleston Myrtle Beach Raleigh Concord Greenville and more!
data.meta_site_name: Book Great Bands │ brioLIVE │ Charlotte Columbia Charleston Myrtle Beach Raleigh Concord Greenville and more!
data.text:
Fleetwood Mac is a timeless band that is recognized by all ages. These songs transcend time, reach a wide range of audiences, and have touched the lives of many. Tell Me Lies will take you on a journey back to the days of when Fleetwood Mac was in their prime, sweeping the world with their passionate, intricate music.

Tell Me Lies has studied the craft, the quirks, and the nuances that are original to Fleetwood Mac. They want to ensure that the audience feels like they are back in the 1970s listening to the hottest band on the scene. The stories of Fleetwood Mac, their relationships, and knowing how it influenced their sound are why it’s so important for the member of Tell Me Lies to hold true to the music of Fleetwood Mac. This band believes that to love Fleetwood Mac and their music, you must fully grasp their spirituality and their history. Their motto, which was set in the very beginning stages of this band is, “It is about THEIR music.” Tell Me Lies, prides themselves on being the most authentic Fleetwood Mac Tribute without coming across as a parody or satire. They will make you dance, sing along at the top of your lungs, and you’ll even learn something new about Fleetwood Mac at each performance. Tell Me Lies is an all ages show suitable for theaters, concert halls, amusement parks, summer concert series, festivals, parks, casinos, corporate events, clubs, and private events.
